catalog.name: Monthly Northern Hemisphere 2.5-degree Tropospheric Analyses for 1946-1972

dataset.name: Monthly Northern Hemisphere 2.5-degree Tropospheric Analyses for 1946-1972

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR GDEX - Monthly Northern Hemisphere 2.5-degree Tropospheric Analyses for 1946-1972(d085002)

metadata.documentation: This dataset contains a time-series collection of monthly Northern Hemisphere tropospheric data on a 2.5-degree latitude/longitude grid. These grids were created by DSS from the grids of ds085.0, which have a resolution of five degrees. The intermediate points of the grids in this set were interpolated from the existing surrounding gridpoints using a 16-point Bessel interpolation scheme.
